mapper.insert: insert into atsast.contest (master_uid, contest_name, description, enable, is_team, is_join, judging, is_instructor, comment, contest_organizer, contest_host, contest_helper, curr_stu, banners, team_group, subject_category, work_category, join_grade, stages, min_member, max_member, min_instructor, max_instructor, contest_type, is_tech) values (#{masterUid}, #{contestName}, #{description}, #{enable}, #{isTeam}, #{isJoin}, #{judging}, #{isInstructor}, #{comment}, #{contestOrganizer}, #{contestHost}, #{contestHelper}, #{currStu}, #{banners}, #{teamGroup}, #{subjectCategory}, #{workCategory}, #{joinGrade}, #{stages}, #{minMember}, #{maxMember}, #{minInstructor}, #{maxInstructor}, #{contestType}, #{isTech});
mapper.select: select distinct team_name, team_id from atsast.team_member where contest_id = #{contestId} and enable = 1
mapper.insert: insert into atsast.file_std (stage_id, file_description, file_limit, contest_id) values (#{stageId}, #{fileDescription}, #{fileLimit}, #{contestId})
mapper.select: select * from atsast.contest where curr_stu = #{curr} and enable = 1
select pushlink from atsast.contest where contest_id = #{contestId} and enable = 1
select file_url from atsast.contest where contest_id = #{contestId} and enable = 1
